title: Key Fragments
body: Ive been playing for a week now, winning numerous games and haven't received a single key fragment. I only have one at this point  which i got 2 weeks ago and i was wondering why i have gotten any.

replies.body:
The drop rate for key fragments isn't a constant, and each one you earn makes earning the next one exponentially harder. Your drop rate resets roughly 30 days after the first fragment you earned.

For complete details on this, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
I know that but that usually happens to me once I need the 3rd fragment not the 2nd one. Thats why I was confused about it.
